author: Gina Francolla
title: Nearly 20% of the S&P 500 is already in a bear market
text:
After Friday's open, 367 S&P 500 companies — or 73 percent — are at or beyond correction level, down 10 percent or more from their most recent 52-week high. 
Of those, 90 companies — or 18 percent — are at bear-market levels or greater, down 20 percent or more from their most recent 52-week high.
Here are the companies currently in a correction or greater.
